thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Arkadi

author: Arkadi
title: Arkadi
text:
After searching practically all sites for flight from Toronto to Tampa in July, Flighthub had it at about $40 each cheaper than the rest. That is $200 saving for 5 people.
To be sure, went back to Air Canada site, the price was still higher (and stayed high). So booked thru Flight Hub.
Confirmation came within seconds - at the cheaper price! And payment on CC shows Air Canada, so all is legit.
Will use FlightHub from now on.
